content:
Mother Taahl’en was skilled at creating a safe and welcoming environment for Val, one that took her sensory sensitivity into account. From the moment Val entered her space, Mother Taahl’en was attuned to her needs and made sure that everything was set up in a way that was comfortable for her. The lighting was soft and muted, the scents were gentle, and the temperature was just right.

During their session, Mother Taahl’en took great care to establish trust and communication with Val. She talked to her in a calm and reassuring voice, and took the time to listen carefully to what Val had to say. She asked her questions about her preferences and boundaries, and encouraged her to be open and honest about what she was feeling.

As the session progressed, Mother Taahl’en slowly and patiently introduced Val to different aspects of BDSM, always checking in with her and making sure that she was comfortable and feeling safe. Through this experience, Val was able to explore and embrace her own desires and fantasies, and to feel empowered by her newfound sense of agency and control.
